name: Sword 'N' Board - Now coming to Wii U!
blurb: In Sword 'N' Board you will battle your way through imaginary enemies, cardboard forests, dark pillow fort dungeons!

rewards.reward: Your name in the credits! You will receive my deep appreciation, as well as your name in a "special thanks" section within the credits of the game.
Get a copy of the game! You will receive your name in the "special thanks" section of the credits, as well as a DRM free copy of Sword 'N' Board!

Get the game and your name in the credits! This is for anyone that wasn't able to get in on the early bird tier for the project and get the game at the discounted rate. You will receive a DRM free copy of Sword 'N' Board and your name in the "special thanks" section of the credits!
You get everything above including the soundtrack for the game, which won't be released for a while after the game is released!
Early Beta access and a digital poster! You will receive everything above as well as exclusive early Beta access to the game and a high res digital poster emailed to you!

Create your own enviornmental asset! You receive everything previously, but also will be able to create your own asset to be used in the game! Whether that be a cardboard asset, Dungeon asset or Overworld asset, that's entirely up to you! While I will retain creative control over the asset, you will work with me directly until we are able to come up with something we're both excited about and put it in the game!

Behind the scenes development videos of Sword 'N' Board! You will receive everything above as well as an hour long look at the making of the game with me! It will show a number of different struggles over the next few months as I make the game!
The comic lover's package! You will receive everything above, as well as an 8 page Sword 'N' Board digital comic to better expand upon the story of Sidd and his adventure.

Get a \r\nSword 'N' Board shirt and an original sketch from me! You will receive everything above as well as a Skype call with me, and I will create a completely original cartoon character of your likeness.

The Secret NPC package! You will receive everything above, but the cartoon likeness of yourself will then also be turned into a NPC of yourself (in cardboard cut out form) and given your own super secret chest room, for players to find! Not only that, but you will receive a Sword 'N' Board T Shirt, featuring the "paint and cardboard" logo!

Receive everything previous, but also get to design your own small puzzle around your NPC's secret room! You will be able to work with me during your skype call, to figure out people will be able to find your room!

The Sword 'N' Board Swag package! Receive everything above but also get a Sword 'N' Board shirt complete with the Sword 'N' Board "paint and cardboard" logo, a Sword 'N' Board baseball cap, and a Sword 'N' Board coffee mug! (What gamer doesn't need coffee?!)
Help me design an enemy! You will receive everything above and also be able to help me design an enemy via Skype as well as be given a special "Enemy designer" credit in the game.

You get to be a producer! You will receive everything above, as well as being able to add additional design  input into Sword 'N' Board. Whether that be item mechanics, puzzles or art elements. While I will retain creative control, we will definitely work until we find something we both really enjoy! Not only that, I will give you a producer credit on the game as well!
